name: SIer Quest
description:
This was a project to see how I could localize a Japanese RPG Maker MV game. The work I did includes:

  • Addition of a start menu language switcher
  • Addition of an in-game menu language switcher (not re-localized into Japanese)
  • Translation of all Japanese strings

Notes:

  • The notebook is not functional; I've localized the strings but "Read" or "Write" will not do anything.

I used the following resources:

  • Original game: SIer Quest by Soichiro Yoshimura
  • Localization plugin by DKPlugins
  • YEP Options Core plugin
